Title: Rixty Minutes
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Tom Kauffman, Justin Roiland, Eric Acosta (staff writer), Wade Randolph (staff writer), Abed Gheith (staff writer), Rashad Gheith (staff writer), Brian Wysol (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Rick hooks up the family's TV with interdimensional cable, allowing them to watch infinite TV from across the multiverse.
